post_message: Why do so few women and minorities work in software engineering? We’re discussing reasons for the gap and what can be done to improve it.  Join filmmaker Robin Hauser Reynolds, whose new documentary, “Code,” explores the issue; Nick Rockwell, CTO at The New York Times; Minerva Tantoco, CTO for New York City; Myrna Soto, Senior Vice President Global Chief Information Security Officer at Comcast; and Jazmine Hughes, Associate Editor at The New York Times. If you have questions, leave them in the comments.  For the second half of this live stream, click here: @webpagelink
